p: HCA results for C. citrinus, C. rigidus and C. viminalis in different seasons are illustrated in Fig 6A, 6B & 6C. The resulting dendrograms displayed the same pattern as all showed three main clusters. Regarding C. citrinus and C. viminalis, the dendrograms revealed the close distance between spring and summer, as they are grouped in the same cluster. On the contrary, C. rigidus, indicated a close association between winter and autumn.
